meanings.definition: Domestic fowl raised for meat or eggs.
meanings.sent1: The farmer fed the chickens in the morning.
meanings.sent2: My grandma collects fresh eggs from her chickens every day.
meanings.sent3: Why did the chickens cross the road? To get to the other side!
meanings.sent4: The chickens in the coop clucked happily in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The children giggled as they chased the chickens around the yard.

meanings.sent1: The boy was too scared to try the roller coaster; he was a real chickens.
meanings.sent2: Don't be a chickens, stand up for yourself!
meanings.sent3: Despite his big talk, he turned out to be a chickens when faced with a spider.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a chickens as she hesitated to speak up in front of the class.
meanings.sent5: The chickens hesitated at the edge of the diving board, afraid to jump.
